content.raw:
X1, X2, and X4 Config 5 does not have either of the two cameras publishing information in ROS. The vehicle is publishing camera feeds in Ignition on /world/virtual\_stix/model/<vehicle\_name>/link/base\_link/sensor/camera\_front\_right/image and “camera\_front\_left” respectively. This appears to be just a piping issue with “vehicle\_topics.launch”

Also, there still seems to be 3D LIDAR being piped onto the 2D front\_scan topic on X1 Config 3\+4 and X2 Config 6 while the 3D LIDAR data is also being published on the “points” topic.
content.html:
X1, X2, and X4 Config 5 does not have either of the two cameras publishing information in ROS. The vehicle is publishing camera feeds in Ignition on /world/virtual_stix/model/<vehicle_name>/link/base_link/sensor/camera_front_right/image and “camera_front_left” respectively. This appears to be just a piping issue with “vehicle_topics.launch”

Also, there still seems to be 3D LIDAR being piped onto the 2D front_scan topic on X1 Config 3+4 and X2 Config 6 while the 3D LIDAR data is also being published on the “points” topic.
